comments.creator: alessandro@thunderbird.net
comments.author: alessandro@thunderbird.net
comments.raw_text: After selecting a message that triggers the visibility of the "Import" OpenPGP key notification bar, if you click on a folder with no messages to preview, the Message Pane is empty but still shows the OpenPGP notification bar.
comments.text:
Created attachment 9149167
Screenshot from 2020-05-14 14-21-43.png

After selecting a message that triggers the visibility of the "Import" OpenPGP key notification bar, if you click on a folder with no messages to preview, the Message Pane is empty but still shows the OpenPGP notification bar.

comments.creator: kaie@kuix.de
comments.text: Thanks for the report. It's probably necessary to hide those panes in a message unload notification.
comments.raw_text: Thanks for the report. It's probably necessary to hide those panes in a message unload notification.
comments.author: kaie@kuix.de

comments.text: Needs a follow-up fix that adds null checks, automated tests on Win/macOS revealed a init/shutdown race where document.getElementById fails in some scenarios.
comments.raw_text: Needs a follow-up fix that adds null checks, automated tests on Win/macOS revealed a init/shutdown race where document.getElementById fails in some scenarios.
